en: Set the trumpet to thy mouth. As an eagle he cometh against the house of Jehovah, because they have transgressed my covenant, and trespassed against my law.
hmr: Tawtawrâwt chu i hmûrah inbûk rawh; LALPA sûnghai chungah mupui angin a hung ie; Ka thuthlung an bawsiet a, Ka dân an helsan leiin.

en: They shall cry unto me, My God, we Israel know thee.
hmr: “Ka Pathien, keini Israelhai hin chu kan hriet che,” Tiin ka kuomah an khêk a.

en: Israel hath cast off that which is good: the enemy shall pursue him.
hmr: Israelhai chun thil ṭha chu an hnâwl a; Hmêlma chun anni hnawt a tih.

en: They have set up kings, but not by me; they have made princes, and I knew it not: of their silver and their gold have they made them idols, that they may be cut off.
hmr: Ka thaw ni loin, annîn lal an siem a, Ka hriet loin hotuhai an siem a; An bohmangna dingin an tang- karuo le an rângkachakin milim an siem a.

en: He hath cast off thy calf, O Samaria; mine anger is kindled against them: how long will it be ere they attain to innocency?
hmr: Aw Samaria, i sebâwngte lim chu a hnâwl ie; An chungah ka lunginsen êm êm a nih. Nun tluongtlama an um thei hma chu ieng chen tak am a ni ding chu.

en: For from Israel is even this; the workman made it, and it is no God; yea, the calf of Samaria shall be broken in pieces.
hmr: Israela inthawk chun hi hi a ni sih a, Sinthawtu siem a na, Pathien a ni nawh; Anih, Samaria sebâwngte lim chu suknâwi vawng nîng a tih.

en: For they sow the wind, and they shall reap the whirlwind: he hath no standing grain; the blade shall yield no meal; if so be it yield, strangers shall swallow it up.
hmr: Thli an chîng a, thli sie an sîk ding a ni sih a, Kûng ngîr a nei nawh a, a zîk khawm chun ra insuo naw ni; Insuo khawm ni sienla, mikhuolhaiin fa zo an tih.

en: Israel is swallowed up: now are they among the nations as a vessel wherein none delighteth.
hmr: Israelhai chu lem zoin an um a nih, Bêl, a sûnga lâwmna um lo angin tuhin hnam dang laia chun an um a nih.

en: For they are gone up to Assyria, like a wild ass alone by himself: Ephraim hath hired lovers.
hmr: Ram sabengtung khât tla angin Assuria ramah an hang fe sih a; Ephraim chun dit zâwnghai a tlawn ie!

en: Yea, though they hire among the nations, now will I gather them; and they begin to be diminished by reason of the burden of the king of princes.
hmr: Anih, hnam danghai laia chun intlawn chîng sienla khawm, Tuhin anni chu kei khâwm ka tih, Lal le hotuhai rikphur leiin an kiem ṭan a nih.

en: Because Ephraim hath multiplied altars for sinning, altars have been unto him for sinning.
hmr: Ephraim chun mâichâm a sukpung hi an thil suksuolna chau a na, An ta dingin mâichâm hrim hrim chu suolna el a nih.

en: I wrote for him the ten thousand things of my law; but they are counted as a strange thing.
hmr: Ka dân chu ka ziekpêk rei rui a, Nisienlakhawm, thil dang takah an ngai a nih.

en: As for the sacrifices of mine offerings, they sacrifice flesh and eat it; but Jehovah accepteth them not: now will he remember their iniquity, and visit their sins; they shall return to Egypt.
hmr: Ka ta dinga inthawina thilinhlânhai chu! Sa an inhlân a, an fâk a; chuong chu LALPAIN a pawm nawh. Chuongchun, an rîtlona hre zing a ta, an suol hrem a ta, Anni chu Aigupta ramah kîr nâwk an tih.

en: For Israel hath forgotten his Maker, and builded palaces; and Judah hath multiplied fortified cities: but I will send a fire upon his cities, and it shall devour the castles thereof.
hmr: Israel chun a siemtu a theinghil a, In ropuihai a bâwl a; Juda chun khawpui kul neihai a sukpung a; Nisienlakhawm, a khawpuihaia chun mei tir ka ta, A in ropuihai chu kâng zo a tih.
